class.name: FixedGenerationCount

javadoc.text: Stops after a fixed number of generations. Each time {@link #isSatisfied(Population)} is invoked, a generation * counter is incremented. Once the counter reaches the configured maxGenerations value,{@link #isSatisfied(Population)} returns true.
Number of generations that have passed

javadoc.param: maxGenerations number of generations to evolve
javadoc.throws: NumberIsTooSmallException if the number of generations is < 1

javadoc.text: Determine whether or not the given number of generations have passed. Increments the number of generations * counter if the maximum has not been reached.
javadoc.return: true IFF the maximum number of generations has been exceeded

javadoc.text: Returns the number of generations that have already passed.
javadoc.return: the number of generations that have passed
